p.s: I read a norwegianNorwegian newspaper article and they talked about three young people and they experiences in Cambodia.
These people work in a textilfabrictextile fabric and they live there.
They have to go to a supermarket alone and have to structure their lives.
They eat many rice and the worksituationwork situation is very confusing.
They told in aan interview that it was very hard to work there.
Doing every time the same thing can be very stressfullstressful.
And when they arrived at home, they said, that they have good live, because other people have a bad life.
Later they were also activactive for thesthese people.
